A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I thought it was great.  A lot of the movie had original concepts.  Definitely not what I expected at all.   It was a really impressive movie\, and it made me think.  This give's me hope for Star wars. 

I noticed a lot of negative reviews about this movie.  And i'll put that into perspective bellow. 

Movies detailing that\, of 100 random negative user reviews from Rotten Tomatoes\, 94% of them either had no account or were first-time users. Of 100 random negative Metacritic user reviews\, 72% of them were new users.

Because of this reason Rottern Tomatoes please change your system to allow only legitimate accounts to post reviews.  That way it will keep the review's honest.   I really do hope you can do that.  Only allow real accounts\, with real people.  Not FAKE accounts. 

Anyone who add's an account then deletes it afterwards just to post a negative review should not count.   

Last of all the amount of money this movie has made pretty much speaks for itself.  

Last of all anyone who really loved this movie I would strongly encourage you to support to movie\, and give it the rating it deserves.
